text:
If there aren't any weird parts when you try it on,
you can take off the costume.

Producer-san!
Can I keep wearing this costume?
I want to greet everyone when they arrive!
Oh, that's fine. Everyone will be surprised.

Hehe, alright!
I'll make a cool entrance when the door opens!

Haha, then after surprising them,
let's make them our allies.

Yeah, let's surprise the next members together while
wearing the costumes. How does that sound?

Wow...!
Yes! That sounds like fun!
